summary:
Dark fantasy styled enb preset.
Will probably stay under the radar.

Skyrim has a dark story: There are dragon attacks, bandits roam in the wilds, dangerous creatures dwell in the countless caves, Necromancers are constantly in search for more and more corpses...
Intrigues, political affairs, assassins, werewolfs.
Not
descriptionHtml:
[b][center][i][font=Times New Roman]SODiUM ENB[/font][/i]
[size=4]by LaBeatbeatbox[/size]
[/center]


[center][/center]
[/b]Skyrim has a dark story: There are dragon attacks, bandits roam in the wilds, dangerous creatures dwell in the countless caves, Necromancers are constantly in search for more and more corpses...Intrigues, political affairs, civil war, assassins, werewolfs.

Not quite a light-hearted Skyrim, full of cheer, right?

This enb merges the dark stories within Skyrim with a dark and sinister style. 





[center][/center]

Installation:
get [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0132.htm]132 binaries [/url]
132 binaries > wrapper version > "d3d9.dll" goes into your skyrim root folder

download the preset

SODiUM zip folder > Sodium > all files go to skyrim root folder



you probably want to deactivate the ambient occlusion (my system has some issues displaying the effect)
you can do this by "shift enter" and deactivating the unwanted effects while running the game (dont forget to apply the changes)
or using the series file "enbseries". 

[Effect]
....
EnableAmbientOcclusion=true  ---> false
....
author: LaBeatBeatbox

files.name: brighter interiors (only version 1.0 compatible
files.changelogHtml:
Improved enb palette saturation and on screen saturation for better atmosphere.
Fixed to bright foggy clouds on the mountains.
Checked "skylighting" effect, set true to use it.

files.name: Sodium enb 1.2
files.changelogHtml:
Improved enb palette saturation and on screen saturation for better atmosphere.
Fixed to bright foggy clouds on the mountains.
Checked "skylighting" effect, set true to use it.
